text: 11:13 Mak 11:20A saghon garima temer fighɨn mam dafaribara iti. Ezɨ a roghɨra mangɨ foghasa a dagheba iti, o puvatɨ. Kar fighɨn temeba bamin dughiam puvatɨ. Ezɨ kamaghɨn a ghua ovɨzitamɨn apizir puvatɨ, dafarir kɨnibaram an iti.11:13 Nɨ fighɨn mɨngarim gɨfoghsɨ, akɨnafarir kamɨn akɨrangɨn itir Akar Mɨngaribar gan.
